article_title: Sen. Marco Rubio sees opportunity for redemption on the right
article_text: They should love him. He has one of the most conservative voting records in the Senate. Yet Marco Rubio, R-Fla., has met with a yawn so far from conservatives, the people who may hold the key to his shot at the presidential nomination.

article_metadata.title: Sen. Marco Rubio sees opportunity for redemption on the right | McClatchy DC

article_summary:
Yet Marco Rubio, R-Fla., has met with a yawn so far from conservatives, the people who may hold the key to his shot at the presidential nomination.
He has one of the most conservative voting records in the Senate.
They should love him.
